item.title: Trump says US has secured $17T in new investments. The number is likely much less.
item.description: President Donald Trump claims his policies have generated $17 trillion in new investments, but the real number is likely much less

item.title: Fifth Third Bancorp to buy Comerica for $10.9 billion in tie-up of big regional banks
item.description: Fifth Third Bancorp is buying Comerica in an all=stock deal valued at $10.9 billion
